alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 02 at 8:38PM PDT until April 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches from 4,000 feet to 5,000 feet. Snow amounts of three to six inches from 5,000 feet to 6,000 feet. Total snow amounts of six to twelve inches above 6,000 feet. Wind gusts as high as 70 mph on exposed ridgetops and along the crest. * WHERE...Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge, Kings Canyon NP, Grant Grove Area and Sequoia NP. * WHEN...From 11 PM PDT this evening until 11 PM PDT Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds may cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP
